biotools.summary: Transcriptome-Wide Association Studies (TWAS) Atlas is a curated knowledgebase of transcriptome-wide association studies, integrating trait-associated transcriptome signals from TWAS publications and constructing TWAS knowledge graph to provide reliable and practical resource for researchers.

bioschemas.name: TWAS Atlas
